description.value:
Trigger Someone attempts to contact Ileosa with call spirit and achieves any result other than a critical success to cast the ritual

Effect Ileosa closes her fingers and attempts to pull the primary caster's heart from their chest. The primary caster must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save.

Critical Success The creature takes no damage.

Success The creature feels Ileosa's hand grip and tug at their heart; they take [[/r 25[negative]]] damage, and then the manifestation vanishes.

Failure As success, but the creature takes [[/r 50[negative]]] damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} as they momentarily see their heart appear in Ileosa's hand before the manifestation vanishes.

Critical Failure The creature takes [[/r 75[negative]]] damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2}. If this reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the target dies instantly. For a brief moment, the victim's heart appears in Ileosa's hand before the manifestation vanishes. If the victim is slain by this hazard, their heart drops to the ground with a splat, pulsing its final beats after the manifestation vanishes.

details.description: Ileosa manifests as a crimson ghost and reaches out as if to receive a gift from the ritual's primary caster.
details.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:37|name:Reverse the ritual's power] (expert) or @Check[type:occultism|dc:40|name:Reverse the ritual's power] (trained) to reverse the ritual's power.
